name: Coin Christmas
description:
Merry Christmas and Happy New Year!

Santa Claus is riding his sleigh with his Reindeers and lots of secret gifts, on the way, to your chimney.
And he will surprise you on Christmas Eve night.

But we are already here with you, celebrating the holiday with our NEW coin pushing game, Coin Christmas.

******* Game Features *******

* Golden Snow Flake Coins
* Various Christmas Gifts to Colletct
* Warm And Heartful Christmas Tunes
* And especially, in Gangnam Style.

**************************

Let’s hit the Gangnam Style mania in the game and spread on the happiness.
